title: Could having used about 75% memory on the Pixel 2 XL be another reason for Wifi issues?
content:
My Pixel 2 XL just recently started having issues with Wifi connectivity, (i.e. staying connected, internet  access, and new pages take so long that they timeout).

I have started my phone in safe mode and still continue to have connectivity problems. 

I have done the Wifi, Bluetooth,  and NSF reset.

I have deleted  all apps that had been acquired since the wifi issue began.

The only thing not done is the complete factory  reset, which I am hoping to find a solution before having to resort to  extreme measures.
